Question:
Being unemployed can be really tough, and a new newspaper article highlighted some difficulties in her interview with a local middle-aged guy and a teenager. Contrary to what many would have expected, the middle-aged guy actually enjoyed not having a job and talked about how he even embraced it when others call him a sloth and a drain in society, but the teenager spent only about two weeks without work before he had a new employer. Job search was hard, but he said he was glad to finally have found a place to have added value. Who contributes to their job? Answer with one of the following options: (The middle-aged guy, Not enough information, The teenager). Answer:
